## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] SEO/metadata update
- [ ] Legal/compliance update

## Checklist
- [ ] I have run `npm run build` and the build passes
- [ ] I have run `npm run check:meta` and all metadata is valid
- [ ] I have run `npm run check:tm` and trademark usage is correct
- [ ] I have checked for em-dashes (use regular hyphens instead)
- [ ] I have verified no sensitive data or secrets are included
- [ ] I have tested this change locally
- [ ] I have updated documentation if needed
- [ ] This PR has a clear, descriptive title
